General.Name: Melnick Even Desenvolvimento Imobiliário S.A
General.Description: Melnick Desenvolvimento Imobiliário S.A. operates as a builder and developer of real estate projects. The company develops residential and commercial projects; and engages in reversible leasing activities. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in Porto Alegre, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Carlos Trein Filho, nº 551, Porto Alegre, RS, Brazil, 90450-120
